system.description:
Class: @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.classes.EWKUOGOMmyHfgOJm]{Wayfarer}

What tales have you recorded in these well-worn pages?

Qualities

  1. The benefits of @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.0n8T7U81oNP7yU5X]{Resourceful} also trigger when you rest without a travel roll.

  2. When you make a discovery due to @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.rsGhkElIiEBgN5zA]{Treasure Hunter} you may perform a @CHECK[ins ins veryHard] check with a bonus equal to your skill level in order to find an additional item.

  3. The benefits of @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.CHMsojkTh3fU8HXg]{Tavern Talk} also trigger when you rest in the wilderness though you must use @UUID[Compendium.fu-azure-compendia.character-inventory.VA3XpOnjvxvNQY3e]{Refreshments} (which you gain the usage of).

  4. When you make a travel roll involving ships you must perform a @CHECK[ins wlp 3]. On a failure your party will become shipwrecked.
